      sum( square of (|xi - centroid| - current radius))
      private void FindStart(int samplesize)
      The function uses algebraic fit to find the start point of the iterative algo.
      private void FittingSelectPTs()
      iterative algorithm to find the best fit of the circle the function uses Newton-Gauss method the approach the best fit The loss function is the summation of the points to the centroid subtracted the current radius then we use jacobian as the gradient descent direction to minimize the loss function after an amount of iteration, the error should be converge to best fit condition
      private org.ejml.simple.SimpleMatrix Jacob(int samplesize)

        private void drawbackground(java.awt.Graphics g)

      • wrapper

        public void wrapper()
        The warpper is a public portal to other class. the function is called only when the button is pressed than the instance does the Fitting algorithm to find the best fit and repaint the component

      • drawCircle

        private void drawCircle(java.awt.Color c,
                        int x,
                        int y,
                        int r,
                        java.awt.Graphics g)
        Parameters:
        c - : color for the circle
        x - : x of top left points of the circle
        y - : y of top left points of the circle
        r - : radius of the circle
        g - : The Graphics instance used for drawing

        private void drawSelectedGrid(java.awt.Point s,
                              java.awt.Graphics g)
        Parameters:
        s - list of points
        g - The Graphics instance used for drawing

      • Bmatrix

        private org.ejml.simple.SimpleMatrix Bmatrix(int samplesize)
        Parameters:
        samplesize: - number of points we selected
        Returns:
        the matrix used for calculation of algebraic fit of the circle

      • FindStart

        private void FindStart(int samplesize)
        The function uses algebraic fit to find the start point of the iterative algo. Bu = 0, argmax(B) ->min(Bu) -> SVD
        Parameters:
        samplesize: - number of points we selected

      • FittingSelectPTs

        private void FittingSelectPTs()
        iterative algorithm to find the best fit of the circle the function uses Newton-Gauss method the approach the best fit The loss function is the summation of the points to the centroid subtracted the current radius then we use jacobian as the gradient descent direction to minimize the loss function after an amount of iteration, the error should be converge to best fit condition

      • distMat

        private org.ejml.simple.SimpleMatrix distMat(int samplesize)
        Parameters:
        samplesize - : number of selected points
        Returns:
        matrix(samplesizex1) of residual vector

      • Jacob

        private org.ejml.simple.SimpleMatrix Jacob(int samplesize)
        Parameters:
        samplesize - : number of selected points
        Returns:
        matrix(samplesizex3) of jacobian matrix of current state, which is the approxiamted slope of the function

      • err

        private double err()
        sum( square of (|xi - centroid| - current radius))
        Returns:
        the error in (double)

      • distance

        private double distance(int ptx,
                        int pty)
        calculate the distance between the centroid to the grid
        Parameters:
        i - : index on the board
        j - : index on the board
        Returns:
        distance in (double) in unit of pixels
